The photographs were taken at the annual: Jerome Catholic Church Picnic in Fancy Farm, Kentucky, which is a well-known event that marks the start of the Kentucky political-campaign season.
The individuals in the photographs were: Team Mitch" shirts, which were a common sight at the event.
The photographs were shared on social me: and Snopes verified the authenticity of the pictures by viewing and archiving the original Instagram version before it was deleted.
